about.details:
Veerkrupa Jewellers Limited is engaged in the jewellery business including the sale of silver, gold, studded and other jewellery products. The company's jewellery is made of gold, silver, studded and other jewellery products that include diamond, platinum and other precious and semi-precious stones. Veerkrupa Jewellers Limited has two showrooms located at Naroda and Narol has an average size of 1050 square feet and 13 staff, the majority of them are sales personnel.

Veerkrupa Jewellers sell a wide range of jewellery products such as designer, traditional, modern and combined designs of jewellery such as earrings, chains, bracelets, gold/silver bars, Bands, Mandalsutra, Pendant sets and chains, Anklets, Waist Belts, necklaces, Hand tools, pooja items and decorative items in silver. The company sell jewellery products for multiple occasions such as weddings and party-wear, jewellery for personal milestones, festival jewellery, daily-wear jewellery, kid's jewellery and men's jewellery.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Use of the established Brand name.
  • Prime Location of the Showroom.
  • Diversified product portfolio across categories and price points.
  • Experienced Promoter and management team with proven execution capabilities.
  • Well established and cordial relationship with our supplier.

faqs.question: What is the Veerkrupa Jewellers IPO?
faqs.answer:
Veerkrupa Jewellers IPO is a SME IPO of 3000000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹8.10 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹27 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on June 29, 2022, and closes on July 8, 2022.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Veerkrupa Jewellers IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Veerkrupa Jewellers IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Veerkrupa Jewellers IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Veerkrupa Jewellers IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Veerkrupa Jewellers IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Veerkrupa Jewellers IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Veerkrupa Jewellers IPO opens on June 29, 2022 and closes on July 8, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Veerkrupa Jewellers IPO?
faqs.answer: Veerkrupa Jewellers IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Veerkrupa Jewellers IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Veerkrupa Jewellers IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Veerkrupa Jewellers IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Veerkrupa Jewellers IPO will be done on Friday, July 8, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, July 12, 2022. Check the Veerkrupa Jewellers IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Veerkrupa Jewellers IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Veerkrupa Jewellers IPO listing date is on Monday, July 18, 2022.
